law.text: Users of a telecommunications relay service shall pay rates no greater than the rates paid for functionally equivalent voice communication services provided without a telecommunications relay. The commission shall determine the appropriate funding mechanism for the telecommunications relay system. The telecommunications industry shall not be required to absorb the cost of funding the telecommunications relay service. The commission may use assistance from public agencies of the state or federal government or from private organizations to accomplish the purposes of KRS 278.547 to 278.549.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 237, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990.
